content: Parookaville（简称：PV）是为期三天的electronic dance音乐节，自2015年起每年在Weeze am Airport举行。Parookaville 以其精心设计的表演概念而闻名，其中包括该活动的舞台被设计成一个独立的城市。
contentEn: Parookaville (short: 'PV' ) is a three-day music festival in the field of electronic dance music, which has been taking place annually since 2015 in Weeze am Airport. Parookaville is known for its elaborately designed show concept, in which the festival is staged as a separate city.
remarks:

原文译自 https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Parookaville
name: Parookaville
descriptions: Parookaville（简称：PV）是为期三天的electronic dance音乐节，自2015年起每年在Weeze am Airport举行。Parookaville 以其精心设计的表演概念而闻名，其中包括该活动的舞台被设计成一个独立的城市。
